{"id":1030109761,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1692846261,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1030109761/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make The String Great","memory":"6.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string makeGood(string s) {\n        string res = \"\";\n        stack<char> st, good_st;\n        for (size_t i = 0; i < s.length(); i++)\n            st.push(s[i]);\n        \n        while (!st.empty()) {\n            string tmp(1, st.top());\n            \n            if (!good_st.empty() && good_st.top() != st.top() && tolower(good_st.top()) == tolower(st.top())) {\n                good_st.pop();\n            }\n            else\n                good_st.push(st.top());\n            st.pop();\n        }\n\n        while (!good_st.empty()) {\n            string tmp(1, good_st.top());\n            res += tmp;\n            good_st.pop();\n        }\n\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-the-string-great","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
